subject: From:       Foreign Debt Of
body:
From:       Foreign Debt Office,
                Office of the President.
                Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Date:        5th February, 2024, Time: 01.35 PM: WAT.
We are writing to inform you that we have unclaimed funds in your name as the legal beneficiary.
We are mandated by the office of the Presidency to contact you that your payment funds valued $10.2M to be processed and transferred to you within 24 hours of opening  communication with you.
You are to send the following: Full name, address, your form of identification, telephone number (WhatsAPP).
We will start the process as soon as you respond.
We will keep you informed as soon as we can.
Thank you,
Mr. Andrew Tweedie.
Head, Foreign Debt Office.
Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re:    From:       Foreign Debt Of
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Tweedie,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about these unclaimed funds. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in relation to these funds? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Roscoe

subject: Re: From: Foreign Debt Of
body:
From:       Foreign Debt Office,
                Office of the President.
                Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Date:        5th February, 2024, Time: 01.35 PM: WAT.


You are asking too many questions, I am only instructed to contact you for
the funds claim.You have a decision to send your details so that we can
process the release of the funds to you.
The foreign offices are in charge of processing the release of funds to all
beneficiaries which you are among them.
The process is as soon as you provide your details, we will commence and
instruct the paying bank to open communication with you and pay you the sum.

You are to send the following: Full name, address, your form of
identification, telephone number (WhatsAPP).
We will start the process as soon as you respond.

We will keep you informed as soon as we can.

Thank you,

Mr. Andrew Tweedie.
Head, Foreign Debt Office.
Federal Republic of Nigeria.

body:
From:       Foreign Debt Office,
                Office of the President.
                Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Date:        5th February, 2024, Time: 01.35 PM: WAT.


I HAVE ANSWERED  ALL YOUR QUESTIONS HERE.
You are asking too many questions, I am only instructed to contact you for
the funds claim.You have a decision to send your details so that we can
process the release of the funds to you.
The foreign offices are in charge of processing the release of funds to all
beneficiaries which you are among them.
The process is as soon as you provide your details, we will commence and
instruct the paying bank to open communication with you and pay you the sum.

You are to send the following: Full name, address, your form of
identification, telephone number (WhatsAPP).
We will start the process as soon as you respond.

We will keep you informed as soon as we can.

Thank you,

Mr. Andrew Tweedie.
Head, Foreign Debt Office.
Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re: From: Foreign Debt Of
body:
From:       Foreign Debt Office,
                Office of the President.
                Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Date:        9th February, 2024, Time: 01.35 PM: WAT.


The paying bank is Vitu bank, the bank will contact you as soon as you
provide to us with your full details as requested.
The bank will request for you to open a new account with them, whereby the
$10.2M will be deposited to the new account you will open with them
The bank will also provide you with the userID and password which you can
use to login to the account and you can commence  funds transfer from the
new account to the account of your choice in your own country, you can
transfer a maximum of $1m per day , you can also decide to maintain and run
the account whereby you can be receiving interests monthly from the account.
The role of the  Foreign Debt Office is only to receive your details and
forward them to the Vitu bank and will also ensure that you receive your
funds, that is all
The only specific requirements or procedures that you need to follow is to
abide by the bank instructions for a successful funds release.
.
Kindly send the following:
 Full name, address, your form of identification, telephone number
(WhatsAPP).
We will start the process as soon as you respond.

We will keep you informed as soon as we can.

Thank you,

Mr. Andrew Tweedie.
Head, Foreign Debt Office.
Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re: From: Foreign Debt Of
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Tweedie,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite interesting to learn about the process involved in this transaction. I have a few questions though, if you don't mind.

Firstly, could you tell me more about Vitu bank? I've never heard of it before and would like to know more about its reputation and services.

Secondly, you mentioned that the bank will provide me with a username and password. How secure is this online banking system? 

Lastly, regarding the transfer limit per day, is there any way to increase this limit if needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Roscoe

subject: Re: From: Foreign Debt Of
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Tweedie,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really interesting to learn about the process of transferring funds through Vitu bank. I have a few questions though, if you don't mind.

Firstly, could you please explain more about how the new account opening process works? Is it something that can be done online or do I need to visit a branch of Vitu bank?

Secondly, you mentioned that I can transfer a maximum amount per day from the new account. Could you please specify what this maximum amount is?

Lastly, I'm curious about the interest rate on this account. How much interest would I be receiving monthly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

subject: Re: From: Foreign Debt Of
body:
Why are you disturbing me with questions upon questions?
The interest rate is 2.1%
You are to open the account online so no need to visit the bank branch
The maximum amount to transfer per day is $1,000,000.00
